Author: linux-security@amazon.com
Title: Amazon Linux 2 2017.12 - ALAS2-2022-1800: medium priority package update for microcode_ctl
Description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2 that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2022-21151:
	A flaw was found in hw. Processor optimization removal or modification of security-critical code for some Intel(R) processors may potentially allow an authenticated user to enable information disclosure via local access.

CVE-2022-21127:
	A flaw was found in hw. Incomplete cleanup in specific special register read operations for some Intel(r) Processors may allow an authenticated user to enable information disclosure via local access.
